parameters.name: DeploymentSetIds
parameters.description: The IDs of deployment sets. The value can be a JSON array that consists of up to 100 deployment set IDs in the format of `["ds-xxxxxxxxx", "ds-yyyyyyyyy", â€¦ "ds-zzzzzzzzz"]`. Separate multiple deployment set IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: DeploymentSetName
parameters.description: The name of the deployment set. The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length. It must start with a letter and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`. It can contain letters, digits, colons (:), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Maximum value: 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the deployment set. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Strategy
parameters.description:
The deployment strategy. Valid values:

*   Availability: high availability strategy.
*   AvailabilityGroup: high availability group strategy.
